In [Hernando Ombao](https://cemse.kaust.edu.sa/biostats/people/person/hernando-ombao)'s group, [Iris Ivy](https://cemse.kaust.edu.sa/stat/people/person/iris-ivy-gauran)'s research interests include high-dimensional data and time-series analysis to investigate genetic variations that are consequential in identifying neurological features of brain connectivity.
